backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining a Contact type with name, email, message, sender, and timestamp fields, storing contacts in a Set with custom comparison logic, and exposing onContact and getAllContacts functions for submission and retrieval.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping seven implemented features (Home, About, Course, Join, VIP, Privacy, Contact pages) to their corresponding files, components, and test IDs with high confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON object containing one-sentence summaries of all frontend source files including pages, components, hooks, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme variables for background, foreground, primary, secondary, muted, accent, destructive, border, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with UTF-8 charset, viewport meta tag, 'GoCode Zone' title, root div, and module script loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component configuring TanStack Router with seven routes (Home, About, Course, Join, VIP, Privacy, Contact) wrapped in ThemeProvider, using a Layout component with Navigation, Outlet, Footer, and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Contact form card component with name, email, and message inputs, client-side validation, submission via useSubmitContact hook, loading states, and toast notifications for success/error feedback.
frontend/src/components/FAQ.tsx: FAQ section component rendering five accordion items covering beginner experience, course duration, Go language benefits, Discord community activity, and VIP membership details.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer with three-column grid layout displaying GoCode Zone branding, quick navigation links, Discord community link, copyright notice, and Caffeine.ai attribution with dynamic UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Navigation component with sticky header, logo, and responsive menu using TanStack Router for routing. Includes desktop nav bar and mobile sheet menu with active route highlighting.
frontend/src/components/Testimonials.tsx: Testimonials section component displaying three student reviews in a responsive grid layout with avatars and cards.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state. Automatically invalidates and refetches dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication on ICP. Manages login state, identity persistence, and provides login/logout functions with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching all contacts and submitting new contact form data via the backend actor. Includes automatic cache invalidation on successful mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and Go brand colors (blue and cyan). Includes utility classes for Go-themed styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: About page explaining what Go/Golang is, what GoCode Zone offers, and who the target audience is (beginners, students, developers). Features hero section and informational cards.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Contact page with a form component and alternative contact methods (Discord, email, message) displayed in cards with icons.
frontend/src/pages/Course.tsx: Displays the course syllabus with 4 units covering Go fundamentals (Getting Started, Variables & Data Types, If & Switch, Loops). Each unit card shows topics and includes a link to start learning.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Landing page featuring a hero section with Go Gopher image, benefits grid highlighting beginner-friendly lessons and community features, plus Testimonials and FAQ components.
frontend/src/pages/Join.tsx: Discord community invitation page showcasing community features, step-by-step joining instructions, and server rules with a prominent Discord join button.
frontend/src/pages/Privacy.tsx: Privacy policy page displaying information collection practices, usage policies, and user rights in a card-based layout with an effective date of February 21, 2026.
frontend/src/pages/VIP.tsx: VIP membership marketing page highlighting premium features like private mentorship, advanced lessons, and real-world projects, with comparison between standard and VIP-only features.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file defining custom color schemes using OKLCH color space, extended theme settings including container, border radius, fonts (Inter and JetBrains Mono), and animations for accordion components.
project_state.json: Project state file documenting GoCode Zone, a Go programming learning platform with Discord integration, featuring a multi-page structure (Home, About, Course, Join Discord, Privacy Policy, VIP/Premium) and a 4-unit course curriculum with quizzes and tests.
